India: Marathas under Bajirao I defeat the Portuguese in the Battle of Vasai, Portuguese army and administration pulled out of Baçaim (Vasai).
Philippine: Gaspar de la Torre appointed Governor-General (1739–1745).
Russia: Russo-Turkish War (1735–1739): Austria agreed by the Treaty of Belgrade to end its participation in the war. Russo-Turkish War (1735–1739): The Treaty of Nissa ended the war. Russia gave up its claims on Crimea and Moldavia and its navy was barred from the Black Sea.
Sweden: Foundation of Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences
